trans-unit.source: Represents the event or events to raise when a node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 또는 경우에 노드를 발생 시키는 이벤트를 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> 컨트롤을 선택 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control is set to a value other than an empty string (""), clicking the node navigates to the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>속성에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>컨트롤은 빈 문자열 이외의 값으로 설정 됩니다 (""), 노드를 클릭 하면 지정된 된 URL로 이동 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property is set to an empty string, clicking the node causes a postback.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>노드 원인을 다시 게시를 클릭 하면 빈 문자열이 면이 속성은.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property determines the events to raise on the postback.
By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Select%2A> event is raised.
No events are raised if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property is set.

> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> property is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to the None value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>속성이 인 노드에 대 한 렌더링 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>None 값 속성이로 설정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded"></xref> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 발생는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded"> </xref> 노드가 선택 될 때 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises no events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 노드가 선택 될 때 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged"></xref> event when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 발생는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged"> </xref> 노드가 선택 될 때 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises both the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded"></xref> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 모두 발생 시킵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded"> </xref> 노드가 선택 될 때 이벤트입니다.
